update APP_POLICE_CHECK
TOWN_ID=#{townId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TOWN_NAME=#{townName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SITE_ID=#{siteId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SITE_NAME=#{siteName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
APP_CODE=#{appCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, APP_NAME=#{appName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CAR_NUMBER=#{carNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NAME=#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PHONE=#{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ID_CARD=#{idCard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AGE=#{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SEX=#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_HUBEI=#{fromHubei,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_WENZHOU=#{fromWenzhou,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FROM_DATE=#{fromDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CLOSE_PERSON=#{closePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS=#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TEMPERATURE=#{temperature,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OTHER_NAME=#{otherName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OTHER_PHONE=#{otherPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CHARGE_SD=#{chargeSd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STREET=#{street,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNTRY=#{country,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCHOOL=#{school,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PERSON=#{contactPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_PHONE=#{contactPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT=#{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUTHORIZATION=#{authorization,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIMESTAMP=#{timestamp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL1=#{col1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL2=#{col2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COL3=#{col3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DATE1=#{date1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DATE2=#{date2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DATE3=#{date3,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SCHOOL_TYPE=#{schoolType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SCCJSJ=#{sccjsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, TXRQ=#{txrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ZJZL=#{zjzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERMEASURE=#{opermeasure,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MZ=#{mz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCS1=#{jcs1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCS2=#{jcs2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCS1XXQK=#{jcs1xxqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JCS2XXQK=#{jcs2xxqk,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFFR=#{sffr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZGTW=#{zgtw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFQTZZ=#{sfqtzz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SFGRBD=#{sfgrbd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QTZZXL=#{qtzzxl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GJCLCS=#{gjclcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQ1=#{rq1,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HSD1=#{hsd1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSD1=#{jsd1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSR1LXDH=#{jsr1lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSR1XM=#{jsr1xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RQ2=#{rq2,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, HSD2=#{hsd2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSD2=#{jsd2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSR2XM=#{jsr2xm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSR2LXDH=#{jsr2lxdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YSJSDW=#{ysjsdw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GH=#{gh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YSJSR=#{ysjsr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CPH=#{cph,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, JSRLXFS=#{jsrlxfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
YWRYQM=#{ywryqm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, YWRYDH=#{ywrydh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DBMJQM=#{dbmjqm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBMJDH=#{zbmjdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZBMJQRRQ=#{zbmjqrrq,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SFBH=#{sfbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZ=#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZXZT=#{zxzt,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DJSJ=#{djsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XGSJ=#{xgsj,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DJR_ID=#{djrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XGR_ID=#{xgrId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CFD=#{cfd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MDD=#{mdd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK1=#{remark1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK2=#{remark2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK3=#{remark3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK4=#{remark4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK5=#{remark5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK6=#{remark6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK7=#{remark7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK8=#{remark8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK9=#{remark9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK10=#{remark10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK11=#{remark11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK12=#{remark12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK13=#{remark13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK14=#{remark14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK15=#{remark15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
REMARK_DATE1=#{remarkDate1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK_DATE2=#{remarkDate2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK_DATE3=#{remarkDate3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK_DATE4=#{remarkDate4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK_DATE5=#{remarkDate5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZZSBSJ=#{zzsbsj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RYLB=#{rylb,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LHJYZDLX=#{lhjyzdlx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where col2=#{col2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select '登记总数' type, count(0) as num from app_police_check a where DJSJ >= (TRUNC(SYSDATE)+ 21/24)-1 and DJSJ <= (TRUNC(SYSDATE)+ 21/24) and zxzt= '正常' union SELECT b.show_name type, sum(nvl(cn, 0)) num FROM (SELECT decode(opermeasure, '', '待核查', opermeasure) type, count(0) cn FROM app_police_check where DJSJ >= (TRUNC(SYSDATE)+ 21/24)-1 and DJSJ <= (TRUNC(SYSDATE)+ 21/24) and zxzt= '正常' group by decode(opermeasure, '', '待核查', opermeasure)) a, oper_messure_record b where b.names = a.type(+) group by b.show_name
